properties.scriptBody:
#!/bin/bash
export KUBECONFIG=./kubeconfig
oc login --token=${p:environment/oc-token} --server=${p:environment/oc-url}
echo "I am user $(id)"
echo "My Home directory is $HOME"
echo "My current OpenShift project is $(oc project)"
echo "Pods running in this namespae/project are"
oc get pods
